title: Directorate's Fall and Reckoning
outcome: The Directorate retaliates fiercely, trying to reclaim Stenograd through direct control. They suppress scoreless districts and manipulate remaining BCI levers. Yet, Halden's last embedded safeguard—a hidden protocol—activates: broadcasting evidence of Directorate abuses, policies of erasure, and damning messages from Halden himself. Public backlash explodes, forcing the Directorate into full retreat. Citizens unite and put the BCI on trial, revealing the system’s darkest secrets for all to judge.

events.description: Directorate agents crack down on scoreless communities, cutting power and seizing personal devices to force compliance.
A hidden protocol triggers—a citywide broadcast of Halden’s voice exposing Directorate cover-ups, purges, and policy manipulation.
Public fury surges; massive protests erupt at government sites. Technocrats leak new documents proving Directorate sanctioned citizen disappearances.
With evidence and outrage mounting, citizens demand the Directorate be put on trial. Technocrats, activists, and everyday people form a tribunal to review every secret tied to BCI.
